course_name: Foundation in Korean Language and Culture
description:
The course examines the foundation of Korean language, its origin and interaction with other languages and culture and how they are integrated in the Korean language. This course also looks at the variations and honorifics in Korean language including the variation in South and North Korean expressions.
This course may be cancelled if there are fewer than 20 enrolments.
prerequisites: KORN2020 or KORN2022 or placement test
